wpPost.content:
Magento 2 is an immensely popular e-commerce platform utilized by countless online retailers across the globe. Renowned for its robustness, scalability, and adaptability, it has become the favored choice for businesses of all sizes. 

An outstanding attribute of Magento 2 is its capacity to offer a multitude of customer promotions. These promotions serve to incentivize purchases, foster customer retention, and drive sales growth. Among these successful promotions lies the Buy X Get Y Free offer, which empowers customers to acquire additional items at no cost upon purchasing a specified quantity of products.

The process of establishing a Buy X Get Y Free promotion within Magento 2 is both straightforward and expeditious. Through appropriate configuration, you can effortlessly implement this promotion to elevate sales figures, stimulate consumer spending, and ultimately expand your enterprise. This blog post will meticulously guide you through each step, ensuring a seamless setup of how to set up Buy X Get Y Free in Magento 2.

Steps to setup Buy X Get Y Free in Magento 2

Step 1: Log in to Your Magento 2 Admin Panel

The first step to setting up a Buy X Get Y Free promotion in Magento 2 is to log in to your admin panel. Once you’re logged in, navigate to the Marketing menu, and select Promotions.

Step 2: Create a New Cart Price Rule

In the Promotions section, you’ll see a list of your existing cart price rules. To create a new cart price rule, click on the Add New Rule button. This will take you to the Cart Price Rule page, where you can start setting up your promotion.

Step 3: Configure the General Information

In the General Information tab, you’ll need to enter a Name for your promotion and specify its status, websites, and customer groups. You can also set a specific time period for the promotion, so it’s only available for a limited time.

Step 4: Set the Conditions

In the Conditions tab, you’ll need to specify the conditions that must be met for the promotion to apply. For a Buy X Get Y Free offer, you’ll want to use the following conditions:

If ALL of these conditions are TRUE:

Subtotal equals or greater than X

Replace X with the minimum amount a customer needs to spend to qualify for the promotion. For example, if you want to offer a free item for every $50 spent, you would enter “50” in the Subtotal field.

Step 5: Set the Actions

In the Actions tab, you’ll need to specify what happens when the promotion applies. For a Buy X Get Y Free offer, you’ll want to use the following actions:

Apply: Buy X get Y free

Discount amount: Y

Maximum Qty Discount is Applied To: 1

Discount Qty Step (Buy X): X

Replace X with the quantity of products a customer needs to purchase to qualify for the promotion, and Y with the quantity of products they’ll receive for free. For example, if you want to offer a free item for every two items purchased, you would enter “2” in the Discount Qty Step field and “1” in the Maximum Qty Discount is Applied To field.

Step 6: Set the Labels

To create custom product labels for your Magento 2 store, you’ll need to go to the Labels tab and configure the labels that will be displayed on the storefront when a promotion applies. It’s important to note that you can customize the labels for different store views, so be sure to select the appropriate store view before entering the label information. Make sure you carefully configure and design product labels in Magento 2 , as it can improve the visibility and appeal of your products, which can ultimately lead to increased sales and customer engagement.

Step 7: Save the Promotion

Once you’ve configured all the settings for your Buy X Get Y Free promotion, click on the Save button to save it. The promotion will now be active and available to customers who meet the conditions you’ve specified.

Conclusion

Creating a Buy X Get Y Free promotion in Magento 2 is a seamless and hassle-free process. Our comprehensive guide provides you with a clear roadmap to set up a promotion that motivates customers to make additional purchases, ultimately driving up your sales. It’s crucial to conduct thorough testing of your promotion before launching it, and closely monitor its performance to ensure it aligns with your desired outcomes. Leveraging the robust promotion features of Magento 2, you possess all the necessary tools to craft effective marketing campaigns and propel the growth of your online business.
